Mohamed Ben Attia, amụrụ na Jenụwarị 5, 1976, na Tunis, bụ onye nduzi na odee Tunisia.

A mụrụ ya na 1976 na Tunis, Tunisia, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Higher Commercial Studies nke Carthage na 1998. Mgbe ahụ, o mere atụmatụ ọrụ ihe nkiri ma gbalịa ịbanye La Femis na Paris, nke a jụrụ ya ịnweta mgbe agba nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ nke nhọrọ ahụ gasịrị
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Ben Attia nwere diplọma nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu pụrụ iche na nkwurịta okwu ọdịyo na anya nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum nke Valenciennes.
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị iche iche na mmepụta ihe nkiri, e mechara were ya n'ọrụ ruo afọ iri na abụọ n'ọkwa azụmahịa na nyocha na ụlọ ahịa ụgbọ ala na Tunis.
A zụrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ edemede Sud Écriture na Tunis, ọ malitere ide ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi, malite na Romantisme : deux comprimés matin et soir na 2005
E mepụtara ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke abụọ ya bụ : Comme les autres (Kif Lokhrim) n'afọ 2006
Mgbe Mouja, kpughere na Carthage Film Festival 2010 ma họrọ ya na CinemAfrica 2011 na Stockholm, ọ duziri Loi 76 (2011), obere ihe nkiri ya nke anọ, mgbe ahụ Selma (2013).

Ọ banyere na ihe nkiri na 2016 na Hedi, ikuku nke nnwere onwe nke Dora Bouchoucha (Nomadis Images) mepụtara na nke ụmụnne Dardenne (Les Films du Fleuve) jikọrọ aka mepụta, kwenyesiri ike na obere ihe nkiri na edemede ya kachasị ọhụrụ.
N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na Cannes Film Festival ebe a na-egosi ihe nkiri ya Dear Son na Directors' Fortnight
